basic.description: In this course, topics covered include quantifying populations and population growth; species interactions such as competition, predation, and mutualisms; documenting community patterns across gradients; adaptation and traits of species; habitat use, movement and species ranges; natural history of local habitats.
basic.subject: PCB
basic.title: Lab for Ecology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L. Corequisite: BSC 3052 or PCB 3043.
